About universAAL Super POM

The universAAL Super POM (from Maven: Project Object Model) defines common rules for all universAAL projects for, e.g., building, reporting (e.g. Javadoc, unit test results), and repository location. The export as Maven Site combines all reports for all universAAL projects in form of a website.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Maven Suite The universAAL Super POM (from Maven: Project Object Model) defines common rules for all universAAL projects for, e.g., building, reporting (e.g. Javadoc, unit test results), and repository location. The export as Maven Site combines all reports for all universAAL projects in form of a website.
universAAL OSGi Integration Tests The set of artifacts for building integration testing, where the full OSGi/uAAL stack is runned.
universAAL Utilities Suite The universAAL Super POM (from Maven: Project Object Model) defines common rules for all universAAL projects for, e.g., building, reporting (e.g. Javadoc, unit test results), and repository location. The export as Maven Site combines all reports for all universAAL projects in form of a website.
universAAL Middleware Suite The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware
universAAL Ontology Suite Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Context Suite The set of artefacts defining the universAAL context tools.
universAAL LDDI Suite The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL Local Device Discovery and Integration
universAAL Security Suite The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL security.
universAAL Remote Interoperability Suite -
universAAL Service Suite .
universAAL UI Framework The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL User Interaction Management framework.
universAAL Karaf aggregation Feature repository The universAAL Super POM (from Maven: Project Object Model) defines common rules for all universAAL projects for, e.g., building, reporting (e.g. Javadoc, unit test results), and repository location. The export as Maven Site combines all reports for all universAAL projects in form of a website.
universAAL Samples Suite A set of components that use the universAAL middleware with different roles and serve as samples.
universAAL Tools Suite -
universAAL IoT Consortium
